entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
